page.title: 11RECREATION: TOFTWOOD AREA
page.content: Although over 5,000 people live in this area, there are actually very few recreational facilities available near to where the people live. Most facilities are located 2 miles away in the centre of Dereham such as swimming pool, tennis and squash club, golf course, bowls club etc. Below is a list of the different recreational facilities we found in our area: Fred Nicholson School: Football, Cricket and Rugby pitches in Westfield Road. Toftwood Middle School: Swimming pool and field, Westfield Road. Recreation Ground: Recreation Road. Public Park: Westfield Road. Sports Club: Whinburgh Road. Dereham Riding School: Gables Farm. Toftwood Social Centre: Main Road.
